description: List of Neighborhood and Rural Preservation Program companies including the organization name and service area description.  New York State Homes and Community Renewal (HCR) provides financial support for these community-based housing organizations to perform housing and community renewal activities statewide. These organizations provide assistance including, but not limited to, housing rehabilitation, home buyer counseling, tenant counseling, landlord/tenant mediation, community rehabilitation and renewal, crime watch programs, employment programs, legal assistance, and Main Street Development.

metadata.attribution: New York State Homes and Community Renewal
